BALANCED ADVANTAGE FUND PGIM INDIA.scheme_details.investment_objective: To provide capital appreciation and income distribution to the investors by dynamically managing the asset allocation between equity and fixed income using equity derivatives strategies, arbitrage opportunities and pure equity investments. The Scheme does not guarantee indicate any returns.
